result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Clay Adam Kunath

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Clay Adam Kunath appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer in court for Clay Adam Kunath.  Prosecuting attorney Josh Milder in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel requests plea and sentencing hearing date.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

Defendant Clay Adam Kunath appeared by video. Attorney Matthew V Plummer in court for Clay Adam Kunath. Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. Court ordered arrest warrant withdrawn. Recall issued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court remains previously signed signature bond of $500.00.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 3 SUPERVISION. 
Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY. 
Court reminded of previously ordered no contact order.
Reissued with date of birth on warrant

Defendant Clay Adam Kunath not in court.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer in court for Clay Adam Kunath.  Prosecuting attorney Josh Milder in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Matter scheduled for Plea and Sentencing Hearing.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court takes no action as to bail.
Justice Point Violation (DISCHARGE) Report forwarded to Judge for review and filed.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Status Report 8-9-2022

Defendant Clay Adam Kunath in court with attorney Matthew V Plummer.  Josh Milder appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status conference. Defense requests resolution date.  Case adjourned to Branch 35 IN PERSON. Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Matthew V Plummer in court, defendant Clay Adam Kunath not in court, in custody. Joshua Milder appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for pretrial conference. Court is in trial on another case and is unable to proceed on this matter. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Status conference scheduled for July 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew V Plummer in court.  Mark Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Emily Bell appeared on behalf of the victim. Case in court for pretrial conference. Court is in trial on another case and is unable to proceed on this matter. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Status conference scheduled for June 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with R.E.S (DOB 10/1/68)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Clay Adam Kunath in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Defendant Clay Adam Kunath in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Clay Adam Kunath appeared by video means with Attorney. Due to nature of case, the defendant is advised that case is reassigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d9e3cc7f-7791-ec2d-80d3-5bfcdc106eb3  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
